description: A PHP source file for managing QoS and CallP statistics in a router's web interface. It includes HTML, JavaScript for UI interactions, and PHP code to fetch and display device-specific data.

methods.name: save_config
methods.description: Handles toggling of logging states and clearing logs, constructing JSON configuration strings and calling set_config to apply changes.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Performs an AJAX POST request to send configuration data to server-side handler and reloads the page upon success.
